aboutUs.title_mini: Learn more about our story, team, and Epicure philosophy.
aboutUs.description1: Epicure started its journey in 2010 as a small family restaurant. Over the years, we have grown into a restaurant chain, but we have retained our core values: quality, hospitality, and attention to detail.
aboutUs.description2: We take pride in creating not just places to eat, but spaces for communication, relaxation, and enjoying exquisite cuisine. Each of our restaurants has its unique atmosphere and concept.
aboutUs.description3: Our mission is to make every visit to the restaurant special and memorable for our guests.
aboutUs.contact_description: If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us in any convenient way

our_team.description1: Our chef with over 15 years of experience in the best restaurants in the world. He creates unique dishes that delight our guests.
our_team.description2: Our customer service manager. He is always ready to help and make your visit unforgettable.
our_team.description3: Our sommelier who will help you choose the perfect wine for your dish. He knows everything about wines and is always happy to share his knowledge.
our_team.description4: Our interior designer who creates a unique atmosphere in each Epicure restaurant. He knows how to make the atmosphere cozy and stylish.
